ColProps.name: lg
ColProps.description: Sets the width for large breakpoint

ColProps.name: md
ColProps.description: Sets the width for medium breakpoint

ColProps.name: sm
ColProps.description: Sets the width for small breakpoint

ColProps.name: span
ColProps.description: Sets the same width across all breakpoints

ColProps.name: xs
ColProps.description: Sets the width for extra small breakpoint

LayoutGridProps.name: fluid
LayoutGridProps.description: Allow the grid be infinitely wide
